review: My husband has Pityriasis Rubra Pilaris also, he is using triamcinolone cream and it is working great on his PRP. Did not know that he could do a shot to clear his feet up faster. Thank you for the information.

Kenalog-10 (triamcinolone):I have Pityriasis Rubra Pilarius, or PRP.  My feet developed a horrible thick peeling layer that cracked and bled continuously.  Topical ointments such as Clobetasol did not help relieve my symptoms.  Kenalog-10 injections over the bottoms of my feet cleared them up within weeks.
